citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45am on
07-Dec-16.
ACI Bartels spoke with a facility representative by phone. They were unable to return to the facility for an inspection
due to being out of state.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45am on
07-Dec-16.
ACI Bartels spoke with a facility representative by phone.  They were unable to return to the facility for an inspection
due to being out of state.
